title: Summer pasta salad
ingredients: ['1/2 cucumber', '200g elbow macaroni', '4 tomatoes', '4 spring onions, trimmed and sliced', '12 stoned black olives, halved', '50g fresh Parmesan, pared into shavings', 'DRESSING', '3 tbsp olive oil', '1 tbsp red or white wine vinegar', '1 tsp prepared mustard', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper']
